alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 1:19PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marshall, southwestern Kittson, northeastern Walsh and southeastern Pembina Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 118 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Thomas, or 15 miles north of Grafton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bowesmont and Drayton around 140 PM CDT. Mattson and Robbin around 145 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 183 and 201. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
